00079 bool BlockDiagram::setDesign(QSharedPointer<Component> hierComp, const QString& viewName)
00080 {
00081     Q_ASSERT_X(hierComp, "BlockDiagram::setDesign()",
00082                 "Null component pointer given as parameter");
00083 
00084     // Clear the edit provider.
00085         editProvider_.clear();
00086 
00087         // clear the previous design configuration
00088         designConf_.clear();
00089 
00090         foreach (QGraphicsItem* item, items()) {
00091 
00092                 // if the item is an interconnection
00093                 if (item->type() == DiagramInterconnection::Type) {
00094                         removeItem(item);
00095                         delete item;
00096                 }
00097         }
00098 
00099     clear();
00100     component_ = hierComp;
00101 
00102     VLNV designVLNV = hierComp->getHierRef(viewName);
00103 
00104         // the received type is always VLNV::DESIGN so it must be asked from the
00105         // library handler to make sure the type is correct.
00106         designVLNV.setType(lh_->getDocumentType(designVLNV));
00107 
00108         if (!designVLNV.isValid()) {
00109                 emit errorMessage(tr("Component %1 did not contain a hierarchical view").arg(
00110                 hierComp->getVlnv()->getName()));
00111                 return false;
00112         }
00113 
00114         QSharedPointer<Design> design;
00115 
00116         // if the component contains a direct reference to a design
00117         if (designVLNV.getType() == VLNV::DESIGN) {
00118                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(designVLNV);   
00119                 design = libComp.staticCast<Design>();
00120         }
00121         
00122         // if component had reference to a design configuration
00123         else if (designVLNV.getType() == VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION) {
00124                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(designVLNV);
00125                 designConf_ = libComp.staticCast<DesignConfiguration>();
00126 
00127                 designVLNV = designConf_->getDesignRef();
00128 
00129                 if (designVLNV.isValid()) {
00130                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(designVLNV);   
00131                         design = libComp.staticCast<Design>();
00132                 }
00133                 
00134                 // if design configuration did not contain a reference to a design.
00135                 if (!design) {
00136                         emit errorMessage(tr("Component %1 did not contain a hierarchical view").arg(
00137                                 hierComp->getVlnv()->getName()));
00138                         return false;
00139                 }
00140         }
00141 
00142         // if referenced view was not found
00143         else {
00144                 emit errorMessage(tr("The hierarchical design %1 referenced within "
00145                 "component %2 was not found in the library").arg(designVLNV.getName()).arg(
00146                 hierComp->getVlnv()->getName()));
00147                 return false;
00148         }
00149 
00150     // Create the column layout.
00151     layout_ = QSharedPointer<DiagramColumnLayout>(new DiagramColumnLayout(editProvider_, this));
00152     connect(layout_.data(), SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00153 
00154     if (design->getColumns().isEmpty())
00155     {
00156         if (component_->getComponentImplementation() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW &&
00157             component_->getComponentSWType() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_PLATFORM)
00158         {
00159             layout_->addColumn("Low-level", COLUMN_CONTENT_COMPONENTS);
00160             layout_->addColumn("Middle-level", COLUMN_CONTENT_COMPONENTS);
00161             layout_->addColumn("High-level", COLUMN_CONTENT_COMPONENTS);
00162             layout_->addColumn("Out", COLUMN_CONTENT_IO);
00163         }
00164         else
00165         {
00166             layout_->addColumn("IO", COLUMN_CONTENT_IO);
00167             layout_->addColumn("Buses", COLUMN_CONTENT_BUSES);
00168             layout_->addColumn("Components", COLUMN_CONTENT_COMPONENTS);
00169             layout_->addColumn("IO", COLUMN_CONTENT_IO);
00170         }
00171     }
00172     else
00173     {
00174         foreach(Design::ColumnDesc desc, design->getColumns())
00175         {
00176             layout_->addColumn(desc.name, desc.contentType, desc.allowedItems);
00177         }
00178     }
00179 
00180     // Create diagram interfaces for the top-level bus interfaces.
00181     foreach (QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf, hierComp->getBusInterfaces())
00182     {
00183         DiagramInterface* diagIf = new DiagramInterface(lh_, component_, busIf, 0);
00184         connect(diagIf, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00185 
00186         // Add the diagram interface to the first column where it is allowed to be placed.
00187         layout_->addItem(diagIf);
00188     }
00189 
00190     /* component instances */
00191     foreach (Design::ComponentInstance instance,
00192              design->getComponentInstances()) {
00193         
00194                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComponent = lh_->getModel(instance.componentRef);
00195 
00196                 if (!libComponent) {
00197                         emit errorMessage(tr("The component %1 instantiated within design "
00198                                 "%2 was not found within library").arg(
00199                                 instance.componentRef.getName()).arg(design->getVlnv()->getName()));
00200                         continue;

00206                                                           instance.displayName, instance.description,
00207                                                           instance.configurableElementValues);
00208 
00209         connect(diagComp, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00210 
00211         // Setup the custom port positions.
00212         QMapIterator<QString, QPointF> itrPortPos(instance.portPositions);
00213 
00214         while (itrPortPos.hasNext())
00215         {
00216             itrPortPos.next();
00217             DiagramPort* port = diagComp->getBusPort(itrPortPos.key());
00218 
00219             if (port != 0)
00220             {
00221                 port->setPos(itrPortPos.value());
00222                 diagComp->onMovePort(port);
00223             }
00224         }
00225 
00226         // Check if the position is not found.
00227         if (instance.position.isNull())
00228         {
00229             // Migrate from the old layout to the column based layout.
00230             layout_->addItem(diagComp);
00231         }
00232         else
00233         {
00234             diagComp->setPos(instance.position);
00235 
00236             DiagramColumn* column = layout_->findColumnAt(instance.position);
00237             
00238             if (column != 0)
00239             {
00240                 column->addItem(diagComp, true);
00241             }
00242             else
00243             {
00244                 layout_->addItem(diagComp);
00245             }
00246         }
00247 
00248                 // add the name to the list of instance names so no items with same 
00249                 // names are added
00250                 instanceNames_.append(instance.instanceName);
00251     }
00252 
00253     /* interconnections */
00254     foreach(Design::Interconnection interconnection,
00255             design->getInterconnections()) {
00256 
00257                 // find the first referenced component
00258         DiagramComponent *comp1 = getComponent(interconnection.interface1.componentRef);
00259 
00260                 if (!comp1) {
00261                         emit errorMessage(tr("Component %1 was not found within the design").arg(
00262                         interconnection.interface1.componentRef));
00263                         continue;
00264                 }
00265                 
00266                 // find the second referenced component
00267         DiagramComponent *comp2 = getComponent(interconnection.interface2.componentRef);
00268 
00269                 if (!comp2) {
00270                         emit errorMessage(tr("Component %1 was not found within the design").arg(
00271                         interconnection.interface2.componentRef));
00272                         continue;
00273                 }
00274 
00275                 // find the port of the first referenced component
00276         DiagramPort *port1 = comp1->getBusPort(interconnection.interface1.busRef);
00277 
00278                 if (!port1) {
00279                         emit errorMessage(tr("Port %1 was not found within component %2").arg(
00280                         interconnection.interface1.busRef).arg(interconnection.interface1.componentRef));
00281                         continue;
00282                 }
00283                 
00284                 // find the port of the second referenced component
00285         DiagramPort *port2 = comp2->getBusPort(interconnection.interface2.busRef);
00286 
00287                 if (!port2) {
00288                         emit errorMessage(tr("Port %1 was not found within component %2").arg(
00289                         interconnection.interface2.busRef).arg(interconnection.interface2.componentRef));
00290                         continue;
00291                 }
00292 
00293                 // if both components and their ports are found an interconnection can be
00294                 // created
00295                 if (comp1 && comp2 && port1 && port2) {
00296                         DiagramInterconnection *diagramInterconnection =
00297                                 new DiagramInterconnection(port1, port2, true, interconnection.displayName,
00298                                            interconnection.description);
00299             diagramInterconnection->setRoute(interconnection.route);
00300                         diagramInterconnection->setName(interconnection.name);
00301             connect(diagramInterconnection, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00302 
00303                         addItem(diagramInterconnection);
00304                 }
00305     }
00306 
00307         // the hierarchical connections
00308     QList<QString> connectedHier;
00309     QList<Design::HierConnection> hierConnections = design->getHierarchicalConnections();
00310     for (int i = 0; i < hierConnections.size(); ++i) {
00311 
00312         Design::HierConnection hierConn = hierConnections.at(i);
00313 
00314                 QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf = hierComp->getBusInterfaces().value(hierConn.interfaceRef);
00315 
00316                 // if the bus interface was not found
00317                 if (!busIf) {
00318                         emit errorMessage(tr("Bus interface %1 was not found in top-component").arg(
00319                                 hierConn.interfaceRef));
00320                         continue;
00321                 }
00322 
00323         // Find the corresponding diagram interface.
00324         DiagramInterface* diagIf = 0;
00325 
00326         foreach (QGraphicsItem* item, items())
00327         {
00328             if (item->type() == DiagramInterface::Type &&
00329                 static_cast<DiagramInterface*>(item)->getBusInterface() == busIf)
00330             {
00331                 diagIf = static_cast<DiagramInterface*>(item);
00332                 break;
00333             }
00334         }
00335 
00336         Q_ASSERT(diagIf != 0);
00337 
00338                 // Check if the position is found.
00339         if (!hierConn.position.isNull())
00340         {
00341             diagIf->setPos(hierConn.position);
00342             diagIf->setDirection(hierConn.direction);
00343 
00344             DiagramColumn* column = layout_->findColumnAt(hierConn.position);
00345             
00346             if (column != 0)
00347             {
00348                 column->addItem(diagIf, true);
00349             }
00350             else
00351             {
00352                 layout_->addItem(diagIf);
00353             }
00354         }
00355 
00356                 // find the component where the hierarchical connection is connected to
00357         DiagramComponent *comp = getComponent(hierConn.interface_.componentRef);
00358                 if (!comp) {
00359                         emit errorMessage(tr("Component %1 was not found within top-design").arg(
00360                                 hierConn.interface_.componentRef));
00361                         continue;
00362                 }
00363 
00364                 // find the port of the component
00365         DiagramPort *compPort = comp->getBusPort(hierConn.interface_.busRef);
00366                 if (!compPort) {
00367                         emit errorMessage(tr("Port %1 was not found within component %2").arg(
00368                                 hierConn.interface_.busRef).arg(hierConn.interface_.componentRef));
00369                 }
00370 
00371                 // if both the component and it's port are found the connection can be made
00372                 else
00373         {
00374             DiagramInterconnection* diagConn = new DiagramInterconnection(compPort, diagIf, true);
00375             diagConn->setRoute(hierConn.route);
00376             connect(diagConn, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00377 
00378                         addItem(diagConn);
00379                         connectedHier.append(hierConn.interfaceRef);
00380                 }
00381     }
00382 
00383     return true;
00384 }

00386 BlockDiagram::~BlockDiagram() {

00389 
00390                 // if the item is an interconnection

00398 DiagramComponent *BlockDiagram::getComponent(const QString &instanceName) {
00399 
00400         // search all graphicsitems in the scene
00401         foreach (QGraphicsItem *item, items()) {
00402 
00403                 // if the item is a component
00404         if (item->type() == DiagramComponent::Type) {
00405             DiagramComponent *comp = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramComponent *>(item);
00406 
00407                         // if component's name matches
00408             if (comp->name() == instanceName)
00409                 return comp;
00410         }
00411     }
00412 
00413         // if no component was found
00414         emit errorMessage(tr("Component %1 was not found within design").arg(instanceName));
00415     return 0;
00416 }

00430 QSharedPointer<Design> BlockDiagram::createDesign(const VLNV &vlnv)
00431 {
00432         QSharedPointer<Design> design(new Design(vlnv));
00433 
00434         QList<Design::ComponentInstance> instances;
00435         QList<Design::Interconnection> interconnections;
00436         QList<Design::HierConnection> hierConnections;
00437     QList<Design::ColumnDesc> columns;
00438 
00439     QList<QString> unpackagedNames;
00440 
00441         foreach (QGraphicsItem *item, items())
00442     {
00443                 if (item->type() == DiagramComponent::Type)
00444         {
00445             DiagramComponent *comp = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramComponent *>(item);
00446 
00447             // Check for unpackaged components.
00448             if (!comp->componentModel()->getVlnv()->isValid())
00449             {
00450                 unpackagedNames.append(comp->name());
00451                 continue;
00452             }
00453 
00454                         Design::ComponentInstance instance(comp->name(), comp->displayName(),
00455                                 comp->description(), *comp->componentModel()->getVlnv(), comp->scenePos());
00456 
00457                         // save the configurable element values to the design
00458                         instance.configurableElementValues = comp->getConfigurableElements();
00459 
00460             // Save the port positions.
00461             QMapIterator< QString, QSharedPointer<BusInterface> >
00462                 itrBusIf(comp->componentModel()->getBusInterfaces());
00463 
00464             while (itrBusIf.hasNext())
00465             {
00466                 itrBusIf.next();
00467                 instance.portPositions[itrBusIf.key()] = comp->getBusPort(itrBusIf.key())->pos();
00468             }
00469 
00470                         instances.append(instance);
00471                 } else if (item->type() == DiagramInterconnection::Type) {
00472                         DiagramInterconnection *conn = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramInterconnection *>(item);
00473 
00474                         if (conn->endPoint1()->encompassingComp() && conn->endPoint2()->encompassingComp())
00475             {
00476                                 Design::Interface iface1(conn->endPoint1()->encompassingComp()->name(),
00477                                         conn->endPoint1()->name());
00478                                 Design::Interface iface2(conn->endPoint2()->encompassingComp()->name(),
00479                                         conn->endPoint2()->name());
00480                                 interconnections.append(Design::Interconnection(conn->name(), iface1, iface2,
00481                                                                 conn->route(), QString(),
00482                                                                                                                                 conn->description()));
00483                         }
00484             else
00485             {
00486                                 DiagramConnectionEndPoint *compPort;
00487                                 DiagramConnectionEndPoint *hierPort;
00488 
00489                 if (conn->endPoint1()->encompassingComp()) {
00490                                         compPort = conn->endPoint1();
00491                                         hierPort = conn->endPoint2();
00492                                 } else {
00493                                         compPort = conn->endPoint2();
00494                                         hierPort = conn->endPoint1();
00495                                 }
00496 
00497                 if (hierPort->getBusInterface() != 0)
00498                 {
00499                     hierConnections.append(
00500                                             Design::HierConnection(hierPort->name(),
00501                                                Design::Interface(compPort->encompassingComp()->name(),
00502                                                                                      compPort->name()),
00503                                                hierPort->scenePos(), hierPort->getDirection(),
00504                                                conn->route()));
00505                 }
00506                         }
00507                 }
00508         }
00509 
00510     // If there were unpacked components, show a message box and do not save.
00511     if (!unpackagedNames.empty())
00512     {
00513         QString detailMessage = tr("The following components must be packaged before the design can be saved:");
00514 
00515         foreach (QString const& name, unpackagedNames)
00516         {
00517             detailMessage += "\n * " + name;
00518         }
00519 
00520         DesignWidget* designWidget = static_cast<DesignWidget*>(parent());
00521 
00522         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Warning, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00523                            tr("Design ") + designWidget->getDocumentName() + 
00524                            tr(" cannot be saved because some component(s) are unpackaged."),
00525                            QMessageBox::Ok, (QWidget*)parent());
00526         msgBox.setDetailedText(detailMessage);
00527         msgBox.exec();
00528         return QSharedPointer<Design>();
00529     }
00530 
00531 //     if (layout_ == 0)
00532 //     {
00533 //         layout_ = QSharedPointer<DiagramColumnLayout>(new DiagramColumnLayout(editProvider_, this));
00534 //         layout_->addColumn("IO", COLUMN_CONTENT_IO);
00535 //         layout_->addColumn("Buses", COLUMN_CONTENT_BUSES);
00536 //         layout_->addColumn("Components", COLUMN_CONTENT_COMPONENTS);
00537 //         layout_->addColumn("IO", COLUMN_CONTENT_IO);
00538 //     }
00539 
00540     foreach(DiagramColumn* column, layout_->getColumns())
00541     {
00542         columns.append(Design::ColumnDesc(column->getName(), column->getContentType(),
00543                                           column->getAllowedItems()));
00544     }
00545 
00546         design->setComponentInstances(instances);
00547         design->setInterconnections(interconnections);
00548         design->setHierarchicalConnections(hierConnections);
00549     design->setColumns(columns);   
00550 
00551         return design;
00552 }

00554 void BlockDiagram::updateHierComponent(QSharedPointer<Component> comp) {
00555 
00556         // store all the bus interfaces to a map
00557     QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<BusInterface> > busIfs;
00558 
00559         // Search all graphics items in the scene.
00560     foreach (QGraphicsItem *item, items())
00561     {
00562                 // Check if the item is a diagram interface and its bus interface is defined.
00563         DiagramInterface* diagIf = dynamic_cast<DiagramInterface*>(item);
00564 
00565         if (diagIf != 0 && diagIf->getBusInterface() != 0)
00566         {
00567             busIfs[diagIf->name()] = diagIf->getBusInterface();
00568 
00569             // Set the bus interface non-temporary.
00570             //diagIf->setTemporary(false);
00571         }
00572     }
00573 
00574     comp->setBusInterfaces(busIfs);
00575 }

00605 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00606 // Function: mousePressEvent()
00607 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00608 void BlockDiagram::mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *mouseEvent)
00609 {
00610     // if other than left button was pressed return the mode back to select
00611         if (mouseEvent->button() != Qt::LeftButton)
00612     {
00613         for (int i = 0 ; i < tempPotentialEndingEndPoints_.size(); ++i)
00614         {
00615             tempPotentialEndingEndPoints_.at(i)->setHighlight(DiagramConnectionEndPoint::HIGHLIGHT_OFF);
00616         }
00617         tempPotentialEndingEndPoints_.clear();
00618 
00619         // Destroy the connection that was being drawn.
00620         if (tempConnection_) {
00621                         delete tempConnection_;
00622                         tempConnection_ = 0;
00623             tempConnEndPoint_ = 0;
00624                 }
00625 
00626         // Disable highlights from all end points.
00627         disableHighlight();
00628 
00629         setMode(MODE_SELECT);
00630         return;
00631         }
00632 
00633     if (mode_ == MODE_CONNECT)
00634     {
00635         // no items are selected if the mode is connect
00636         clearSelection();
00637 
00638         // Try to snap to a connection end point.
00639         DiagramConnectionEndPoint* endPoint =
00640             DiagramUtil::snapToItem<DiagramConnectionEndPoint>(mouseEvent->scenePos(), this, GridSize);
00641 
00642         if (endPoint == 0)
00643         {
00644             return;
00645         }
00646 
00647         // Create the connection.
00648         tempConnEndPoint_ = endPoint;
00649         tempConnection_ = new DiagramInterconnection(endPoint->scenePos(),
00650                                                      tempConnEndPoint_->getDirection(),
00651                                                      endPoint->scenePos(),
00652                                                      QVector2D(0.0f, 0.0f));
00653 
00654         addItem(tempConnection_);
00655 
00656         // Determine all potential end points to which the starting end point could be connected
00657         // and highlight them.
00658         foreach(QGraphicsItem* item, items())
00659         {
00660             DiagramConnectionEndPoint* endPoint = dynamic_cast<DiagramConnectionEndPoint*>(item);
00661 
00662             if (endPoint != 0 && endPoint != tempConnEndPoint_ &&
00663                 endPoint->canConnect(tempConnEndPoint_) && tempConnEndPoint_->canConnect(endPoint))
00664             {
00665                 tempPotentialEndingEndPoints_.append(endPoint);
00666                 endPoint->setHighlight(DiagramConnectionEndPoint::HIGHLIGHT_ALLOWED);
00667             }
00668         }
00669     }
00670     else if (mode_ == MODE_INTERFACE)
00671     {
00672         // Find the column under the cursor.
00673         DiagramColumn* column = layout_->findColumnAt(mouseEvent->scenePos());
00674 
00675         // Add a new diagram interface to the column it it is allowed.
00676         if (column != 0 && column->getAllowedItems() & CIT_INTERFACE)
00677         {
00678             addInterface(column, mouseEvent->scenePos());
00679         }
00680     }
00681     else if (mode_ == MODE_DRAFT)
00682     {
00683         // Find the bottom-most item under the cursor.
00684         QGraphicsItem* item = 0;
00685         QList<QGraphicsItem*> itemList = items(mouseEvent->scenePos());
00686         
00687         if (!itemList.empty())
00688         {
00689             item = itemList.back();
00690         }
00691 
00692         // If there was no item, then a new component/channel/bridge/interface should be added
00693         // to the column under cursor.
00694         if (item == 0)
00695         {
00696             DiagramColumn* column = layout_->findColumnAt(mouseEvent->scenePos());
00697             
00698             if (column != 0)
00699             {
00700                 // Check what kind of item should be created.
00701                 unsigned int itemType = column->getAllowedItems();
00702                 
00703                 // Check if the item type is ambiguous (interface vs. the rest of the types).
00704                 if (itemType != CIT_INTERFACE && itemType & CIT_INTERFACE)
00705                 {
00706                     // Open a dialog to determine which type of item to create.
00707                     SelectItemTypeDialog dialog((QWidget*)parent(), column->getAllowedItems());
00708 
00709                     if (dialog.exec() != QDialog::Accepted)
00710                     {
00711                         return;
00712                     }
00713 
00714                     itemType = dialog.getSelectedItemType();
00715                 }
00716 
00717                 // Create the item based on the selected/determined type.
00718                 if (itemType == CIT_INTERFACE)
00719                 {
00720                     addInterface(column, mouseEvent->scenePos());
00721                 }
00722                 else
00723                 {
00724                     // Determine an unused name for the component instance.
00725                     QString name = "unnamed";
00726                     int runningNumber = 0;
00727                     
00728                     while (instanceNames_.contains(name))
00729                     {
00730                         ++runningNumber;
00731                         name = "unnamed_" + QString::number(runningNumber);
00732                     }
00733 
00734                     instanceNames_.append(name);
00735 
00736                     // Create a component model without a valid vlnv.
00737                     QSharedPointer<Component> comp = QSharedPointer<Component>(new Component());
00738                     comp->setVlnv(VLNV());
00739                     comp->setComponentImplementation(component_->getComponentImplementation());
00740 
00741                     if (component_->getComponentImplementation() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW)
00742                     {
00743                         comp->setComponentSWType(component_->getComponentSWType());
00744                     }
00745 
00746                     // Create the corresponding diagram component.
00747                     DiagramComponent* diagComp = new DiagramComponent(lh_, comp, name);
00748                     diagComp->setPos(snapPointToGrid(mouseEvent->scenePos()));
00749                     connect(diagComp, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00750 
00751                     QSharedPointer<ItemAddCommand> cmd(new ItemAddCommand(column, diagComp));
00752 
00753                                         connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(DiagramComponent*)),
00754                                                 this, SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(DiagramComponent*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00755                                         connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(DiagramComponent*)),
00756                                                 this, SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(DiagramComponent*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00757 
00758                     editProvider_.addCommand(cmd);
00759                 }
00760 
00761                 emit contentChanged();
00762             }
00763         }
00764         // Otherwise check if the item is an unpackaged component in which case
00765         // we can add a new port (bus interface) to it.
00766         else if (item->type() == DiagramComponent::Type)
00767         {
00768             DiagramComponent* comp = static_cast<DiagramComponent*>(item);
00769 
00770             // The component is unpackaged if it has an invalid vlnv.
00771             if (!comp->componentModel()->getVlnv()->isValid())
00772             {
00773                 QMap<DiagramPort*, QPointF> oldPositions;
00774 
00775                 // Save old port positions.
00776                 foreach (QGraphicsItem* item, comp->childItems())
00777                 {
00778                     if (item->type() == DiagramPort::Type)
00779                     {
00780                         DiagramPort* port = static_cast<DiagramPort*>(item);
00781                         oldPositions.insert(port, port->pos());
00782                     }
00783                 }
00784 
00785                 QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new PortAddCommand(comp, snapPointToGrid(mouseEvent->scenePos())));
00786                 cmd->redo();
00787                 
00788                 // Create child undo commands for the changed ports.
00789                 QMap<DiagramPort*, QPointF>::iterator cur = oldPositions.begin();
00790 
00791                 while (cur != oldPositions.end())
00792                 {
00793                     if (cur.key()->pos() != cur.value())
00794                     {
00795                         QUndoCommand* childCmd = new PortMoveCommand(cur.key(), cur.value(), cmd.data());
00796                     }
00797 
00798                     ++cur;
00799                 }
00800 
00801                 // Add the command to the edit stack.
00802                 editProvider_.addCommand(cmd, false);
00803             }
00804         }
00805     }
00806     else if (mode_ == MODE_SELECT)
00807     {
00808         // Save the old selection.
00809         QGraphicsItem *oldSelection = 0;
00810 
00811         if (!selectedItems().isEmpty())
00812         {
00813             oldSelection = selectedItems().front();
00814         }
00815 
00816         // Handle the mouse press and bring the new selection to front.
00817         QGraphicsScene::mousePressEvent(mouseEvent);
00818         selectionToFront();
00819 
00820         // Retrieve the new selection.
00821         QGraphicsItem *newSelection = 0;
00822 
00823         if (!selectedItems().isEmpty())
00824         {
00825             newSelection = selectedItems().front();
00826         }
00827 
00828         onSelected(newSelection);
00829 
00830         if (oldSelection && oldSelection->type() == DiagramInterconnection::Type)
00831             if (!selectedItems().size() || selectedItems().first() != oldSelection)
00832                 oldSelection->setZValue(-1000);
00833     }
00834 }
00835 
00836 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00837 // Function: mouseMoveEvent()
00838 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00839 void BlockDiagram::mouseMoveEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *mouseEvent)
00840 {
00841     // Check if the connect mode is active.
00842     if (mode_ == MODE_CONNECT)
00843     {
00844         // Find out if there is an end point currently under the cursor.
00845         DiagramConnectionEndPoint* endPoint =
00846             DiagramUtil::snapToItem<DiagramConnectionEndPoint>(mouseEvent->scenePos(), this, GridSize);
00847 
00848         if (tempConnection_)
00849         {
00850             // Check if there was an valid endpoint close enough.
00851             if (endPoint != 0 && tempPotentialEndingEndPoints_.contains(endPoint))
00852             {
00853                 // Highlight the end point.
00854                 disableHighlight();                
00855                 highlightedEndPoint_ = endPoint;
00856                 highlightedEndPoint_->setHighlight(DiagramConnectionEndPoint::HIGHLIGHT_HOVER);
00857 
00858             }
00859             // Disable the highlight if there was no end point close enough.
00860             else
00861             {
00862                 disableHighlight();
00863             }
00864 
00865             // Update the connection.
00866             Q_ASSERT(tempConnection_->route().size() != 0);
00867 
00868             DiagramInterconnection* newTempConnection_ = 0;
00869 
00870             if (highlightedEndPoint_ != 0)
00871             {
00872                  newTempConnection_ = new DiagramInterconnection(tempConnEndPoint_,
00873                                                                  highlightedEndPoint_, false);
00874             }
00875             else
00876             {
00877                 newTempConnection_ = new DiagramInterconnection(tempConnEndPoint_->scenePos(),
00878                     tempConnEndPoint_->getDirection(), snapPointToGrid(mouseEvent->scenePos()),
00879                     QVector2D(0.0f, 0.0f));
00880             }
00881 
00882             removeItem(tempConnection_);
00883                         delete tempConnection_;
00884                         tempConnection_ = newTempConnection_;
00885 
00886                         addItem(tempConnection_);
00887                         return;
00888         }
00889         else
00890         {
00891             if (highlightedEndPoint_ != 0)
00892             {
00893                 highlightedEndPoint_->setHighlight(DiagramConnectionEndPoint::HIGHLIGHT_OFF);
00894                 highlightedEndPoint_ = 0;
00895             }
00896 
00897             if (endPoint != 0)
00898             {
00899                 highlightedEndPoint_ = endPoint;
00900                 highlightedEndPoint_->setHighlight(DiagramConnectionEndPoint::HIGHLIGHT_HOVER);
00901             }
00902         }
00903     }
00904 
00905     QGraphicsScene::mouseMoveEvent(mouseEvent);
00906 }
00907 
00908 void BlockDiagram::mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *mouseEvent)
00909 {
00910         // if mode is connect and there is a connection being created and at least
00911         // one item can be selected.
00912     if (mode_ == MODE_CONNECT && tempConnection_)
00913     {
00914         // Disable highlights from all potential end points.
00915         for (int i = 0 ; i < tempPotentialEndingEndPoints_.size(); ++i)
00916         {
00917             tempPotentialEndingEndPoints_.at(i)->setHighlight(DiagramConnectionEndPoint::HIGHLIGHT_OFF);
00918         }
00919         tempPotentialEndingEndPoints_.clear();
00920 
00921                 //QGraphicsItem* item = itemAt(snapPointToGrid(mouseEvent->scenePos()));
00922                 DiagramConnectionEndPoint* endPoint =
00923             DiagramUtil::snapToItem<DiagramConnectionEndPoint>(mouseEvent->scenePos(), this, GridSize);
00924 
00925         // Check if there is no end point close enough to the cursor or the
00926         // end points cannot be connected together.
00927                 if (endPoint == 0 || endPoint == tempConnEndPoint_ ||
00928             !endPoint->canConnect(tempConnEndPoint_) ||
00929             !tempConnEndPoint_->canConnect(endPoint)) {
00930                         
00931                         // if tempConnection has been created then delete it
00932                         if (tempConnection_) {
00933                                 removeItem(tempConnection_);
00934                                 delete tempConnection_;
00935                                 tempConnection_ = 0;
00936                 tempConnEndPoint_ = 0;
00937                         }
00938                 }
00939                 else 
00940         {
00941             connect(tempConnection_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00942 
00943             if (tempConnection_->connectEnds())
00944             {
00945                 QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new ConnectionAddCommand(this, tempConnection_));
00946                 editProvider_.addCommand(cmd, false);
00947 
00948                 tempConnection_ = 0;
00949                 tempConnEndPoint_ = 0;
00950                             emit contentChanged();
00951             }
00952             else
00953             {
00954                 delete tempConnection_;
00955                 tempConnection_ = 0;
00956                 tempConnEndPoint_ = 0;
00957             }            
00958                 }
00959     }
00960         // process the normal mouse release event
00961     QGraphicsScene::mouseReleaseEvent(mouseEvent);
00962 }
00963 
00964 void BlockDiagram::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *mouseEvent)
00965 {
00966     // Allow double click only when the mode is select.
00967     if (mode_ != MODE_SELECT)
00968     {
00969         return;
00970     }
00971 
00972     // Find the item under the cursor.
00973     QGraphicsItem *item = itemAt(snapPointToGrid(mouseEvent->scenePos()));
00974 
00975     if (item == 0)
00976     {
00977         return;
00978     }
00979 
00980     //clearSelection();
00981 
00982     // This fixes the problem when the user click above a text label or a pixmap but
00983     // actually wants to select the parent item (such as the actual component, not its label).
00984     if (item->parentItem() != 0 && item->type() != DiagramComponent::Type &&
00985         item->type() != DiagramPort::Type && item->type() != DiagramInterface::Type &&
00986         item->type() != DiagramColumn::Type)
00987     {
00988         item = item->parentItem();
00989     }
00990 
00991     if (item->type() == DiagramComponent::Type)
00992     {
00993         item->setSelected(true);
00994         DiagramComponent *comp = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramComponent *>(item);
00995 
00996         if (comp->componentModel()->getVlnv()->isValid())
00997         {
00998                         QString viewName;
00999                         if (designConf_)
01000                                 viewName = designConf_->getActiveView(comp->name());
01001                         
01002                         // if configuration is not used then open some view
01003                         else {
01004                                 QStringList hierViews = comp->componentModel()->getHierViews();
01005                                 // open the first hierarchical view
01006                                 if (!hierViews.isEmpty()) {
01007                                         viewName = hierViews.first();
01008                                 }
01009         
01010                                 // if component is a flat component then use the first flat view
01011                                 QStringList flatViews = comp->componentModel()->getViewNames();
01012                                 if (!flatViews.isEmpty()) {
01013                                         viewName = flatViews.first();
01014                                 }
01015                         }
01016 
01017                     View* view = comp->componentModel()->findView(viewName);
01018 
01019                     // if view was found and it is hierarchical
01020             if (view && view->isHierarchical())
01021                             emit openDesign(*comp->componentModel()->getVlnv(), viewName);
01022                         
01023                         // if view was found but it is not hierarchical
01024                         else if (view && !view->isHierarchical())
01025                                 emit openComponent(*comp->componentModel()->getVlnv());
01026 
01027                         // if component does not contain any views
01028                         else if (!comp->componentModel()->hasViews()) {
01029                                 emit openComponent(*comp->componentModel()->getVlnv());
01030                         }
01031                     // view was not found but component contains views
01032                     else {
01033                             emit errorMessage(tr("No view selected for component instance %1").arg(comp->name()));
01034                     }
01035         }
01036         else
01037         {
01038             // Otherwise this is an unpackaged component. Check if the bus interfaces are valid.
01039             foreach (QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf, comp->componentModel()->getBusInterfaces())
01040             {
01041                 if (!busIf->getBusType().isValid())
01042                 {
01043                     QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Warning, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
01044                                        tr("Component '%1' cannot be packetized because all bus interfaces "
01045                                           "have not been defined.").arg(comp->name()),
01046                                        QMessageBox::Ok, (QWidget*)parent());
01047                     msgBox.setInformativeText(tr("Define first the buses by dragging from the library "
01048                                                  "or double clicking the bus interface."));
01049                     
01050                     msgBox.exec();
01051                     return;
01052                 }
01053             }
01054             
01055             // Request the user to set the vlnv.
01056             NewObjectDialog dialog(lh_, VLNV::COMPONENT, true, (QWidget*)parent());
01057             dialog.setWindowTitle(tr("Add Component to Library"));
01058 
01059             if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Rejected)
01060             {
01061                 return;
01062             }
01063 
01064             VLNV vlnv = dialog.getVLNV();
01065             comp->componentModel()->setVlnv(vlnv);
01066             comp->componentModel()->setComponentHierarchy(dialog.getProductHierarchy());
01067             comp->componentModel()->setComponentFirmness(dialog.getFirmness());
01068 
01069             // Write the model to file.
01070             lh_->writeModelToFile(dialog.getPath(), comp->componentModel());
01071 
01072             // Update the diagram component.
01073             comp->updateComponent();
01074 
01075             // Create an undo command.
01076             QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new ComponentPacketizeCommand(comp, vlnv));
01077             editProvider_.addCommand(cmd, false);
01078 
01079             // Ask the user if he wants to complete the component.
01080             QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Question, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
01081                                "Do you want to continue packaging the component completely?",
01082                                QMessageBox::NoButton, (QWidget*)parent());
01083             msgBox.setInformativeText("Pressing Continue opens up the component editor.");
01084             QPushButton* btnContinue = msgBox.addButton(tr("Continue"), QMessageBox::ActionRole);
01085             msgBox.addButton(tr("Skip"), QMessageBox::RejectRole);
01086 
01087             msgBox.exec();
01088 
01089             if (msgBox.clickedButton() == btnContinue)
01090             {
01091                 // Open up the component editor.
01092                                 emit openComponent(*comp->componentModel()->getVlnv());
01093             }
01094         }
01095     }
01096     else if (item->type() == DiagramColumn::Type)
01097     {
01098         item->setSelected(true);
01099         DiagramColumn* column = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramColumn*>(item);
01100 
01101         ColumnEditDialog dialog((QWidget*)parent(), column);
01102 
01103         if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Accepted)
01104         {
01105             QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new ColumnChangeCommand(column, dialog.getName(),
01106                                                                      dialog.getContentType(),
01107                                                                      dialog.getAllowedItems()));
01108             editProvider_.addCommand(cmd);
01109 
01110         }
01111     }
01112     else if (item->type() == DiagramPort::Type || item->type() == DiagramInterface::Type)
01113     {
01114         DiagramConnectionEndPoint* endPoint = static_cast<DiagramConnectionEndPoint*>(item);
01115 
01116         // Check if the bus is unpackaged.
01117         if (endPoint->getBusInterface() == 0 || !endPoint->getBusInterface()->getBusType().isValid())
01118         {
01119             // Request the user to set the vlnv.
01120             NewObjectDialog dialog(lh_, VLNV::BUSDEFINITION, true, (QWidget*)parent());
01121             dialog.setWindowTitle(tr("Create New Bus"));
01122 
01123             if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Rejected)
01124             {
01125                 return;
01126             }
01127 
01128             VLNV busVLNV = dialog.getVLNV();
01129             VLNV absVLNV = busVLNV;
01130             absVLNV.setName(busVLNV.getName() + ".absDef");
01131             absVLNV.setType(VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION);
01132 
01133             // Make sure that both VLNVs are not yet used.
01134             if (lh_->contains(busVLNV))
01135             {
01136                 emit errorMessage(tr("Bus definition %1:%2:%3:%4 was already found in library").arg(
01137                     busVLNV.getVendor()).arg(
01138                     busVLNV.getLibrary()).arg(
01139                     busVLNV.getName()).arg(
01140                     busVLNV.getVersion()));
01141                 return;
01142             }
01143             else if (lh_->contains(absVLNV)) {
01144                 emit errorMessage(tr("Abstraction definition %1:%2:%3:%4 was already found in library").arg(
01145                     absVLNV.getVendor()).arg(
01146                     absVLNV.getLibrary()).arg(
01147                     absVLNV.getName()).arg(
01148                     absVLNV.getVersion()));
01149                 return;
01150             }
01151 
01152             // Create a bus definition.
01153             QSharedPointer<BusDefinition> busDef = QSharedPointer<BusDefinition>(new BusDefinition());
01154             busDef->setVlnv(busVLNV);
01155 
01156             // Create the file for the bus definition.
01157             lh_->writeModelToFile(dialog.getPath(), busDef);
01158 
01159             // Create an abstraction definition.
01160             QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition> absDef = QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition>(new AbstractionDefinition());
01161             absDef->setVlnv(absVLNV);
01162 
01163             // Set the reference from abstraction definition to bus definition.
01164             absDef->setBusType(busVLNV);
01165 
01166             // Create the file for the abstraction definition.
01167             lh_->writeModelToFile(dialog.getPath(), absDef);
01168 
01169             // Ask the user for the interface mode.
01170             endPoint->setHighlight(DiagramConnectionEndPoint::HIGHLIGHT_HOVER);
01171 
01172             bool editName = endPoint->type() == DiagramInterface::Type &&
01173                             endPoint->getInterconnections().empty();
01174 
01175             BusInterfaceDialog modeDialog(editName, (QWidget*)parent());
01176             modeDialog.addMode(General::MIRROREDMASTER);
01177             modeDialog.addMode(General::SLAVE);
01178             modeDialog.addMode(General::MIRROREDSLAVE);
01179             modeDialog.addMode(General::SYSTEM);
01180             modeDialog.addMode(General::MIRROREDSYSTEM);
01181             modeDialog.addMode(General::MASTER);
01182 
01183             if (modeDialog.exec() == QDialog::Rejected)
01184             {
01185                 endPoint->setHighlight(DiagramConnectionEndPoint::HIGHLIGHT_OFF);
01186                 return;
01187             }
01188 
01189             endPoint->setHighlight(DiagramConnectionEndPoint::HIGHLIGHT_OFF);
01190 
01191             // Save old settings.
01192             VLNV oldBusType;
01193             VLNV oldAbsType;
01194             General::InterfaceMode oldMode = General::MASTER;
01195             QString oldName = "";
01196 
01197             if (endPoint->getBusInterface() != 0)
01198             {
01199                 oldBusType = endPoint->getBusInterface()->getBusType();
01200                 oldAbsType = endPoint->getBusInterface()->getAbstractionType();
01201                 oldMode = endPoint->getBusInterface()->getInterfaceMode();
01202                 oldName = endPoint->getBusInterface()->getName();
01203             }
01204 
01205             // Set the types for the end point.
01206             endPoint->setTypes(busVLNV, absVLNV, modeDialog.getSelectedMode());
01207 
01208             if (editName)
01209             {
01210                 endPoint->getBusInterface()->setName(modeDialog.getName());
01211             }
01212 
01213             endPoint->updateInterface();
01214 
01215             QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new EndPointTypesCommand(endPoint, oldBusType,
01216                                                                       oldAbsType, oldMode, oldName));
01217             editProvider_.addCommand(cmd, false);
01218 
01219             // Select the end point (to update the property widget contents).
01220             if (endPoint->type() == DiagramPort::Type)
01221             {
01222                 emit portSelected(static_cast<DiagramPort*>(endPoint));
01223             }
01224             else
01225             {
01226                 emit interfaceSelected(static_cast<DiagramInterface*>(endPoint));
01227             }
01228 
01229             QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Question, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
01230                                "Do you want to continue defining the bus?",
01231                                QMessageBox::NoButton, (QWidget*)parent());
01232             msgBox.setInformativeText("Pressing Continue opens up the bus editor.");
01233             QPushButton* btnContinue = msgBox.addButton(tr("Continue"), QMessageBox::ActionRole);
01234             msgBox.addButton(tr("Skip"), QMessageBox::RejectRole);
01235 
01236             msgBox.exec();
01237 
01238             // Open the user clicked continue, open up the bus editor.
01239             if (msgBox.clickedButton() == btnContinue)
01240             {
01241                 emit openBus(busVLNV, absVLNV, false);
01242             }
01243         }
01244     }
01245 }
01246 
01247 void BlockDiagram::drawBackground(QPainter* painter, const QRectF& rect)
01248 {
01249     if (dynamic_cast<QPrinter*>(painter->device()) == 0)
01250     {
01251         painter->setWorldMatrixEnabled(true);
01252         painter->setBrush(Qt::lightGray);
01253 
01254         qreal left = int(rect.left()) - (int(rect.left()) % GridSize );
01255         qreal top = int(rect.top()) - (int(rect.top()) % GridSize );
01256 
01257         for (qreal x = left; x < rect.right(); x += GridSize ) {
01258             for (qreal y = top; y < rect.bottom(); y += GridSize )
01259                 painter->drawPoint(x, y);
01260         }
01261     }
01262 }
01263 
01264 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01265 // Function: dragEnterEvent()
01266 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01267 void BlockDiagram::dragEnterEvent(QGraphicsSceneDragDropEvent * event)
01268 {
01269     dragCompType_ = CIT_NONE;
01270     dragBus_ = false;
01271 
01272     // Allow drag only if the diagram is not locked and the dragged object is a vlnv.
01273     if (!locked_ && event->mimeData()->hasFormat("data/vlnvptr"))
01274     {
01275         event->acceptProposedAction();
01276 
01277         VLNV *vlnv;
01278         memcpy(&vlnv, event->mimeData()->data("data/vlnvptr").data(), sizeof(vlnv));
01279 
01280         if (vlnv->getType() == VLNV::COMPONENT)
01281         {
01282             // Determine the component type.
01283                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(*vlnv);
01284             QSharedPointer<Component> comp = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
01285 
01286             // component with given vlnv was not found
01287             if (!comp) {
01288                                 emit errorMessage(tr("Component with the VLNV %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found in the library.").arg(
01289                                         vlnv->getVendor()).arg(
01290                                         vlnv->getLibrary()).arg(
01291                                         vlnv->getName()).arg(
01292                                         vlnv->getVersion()));
01293                 return;
01294             }
01295 
01296             // Check if the implementation does not match with the edited component.
01297             if (comp->getComponentImplementation() != component_->getComponentImplementation())
01298             {
01299                 return;
01300             }
01301 
01302             if (comp->isBridge())
01303             {
01304                 dragCompType_ = CIT_BRIDGE;
01305             }
01306             else if (comp->isChannel())
01307             {
01308                 dragCompType_ = CIT_CHANNEL;
01309             }
01310             else
01311             {
01312                 dragCompType_ = CIT_COMPONENT;
01313             }
01314             comp.clear();
01315         }
01316         else if (vlnv->getType() == VLNV::BUSDEFINITION || 
01317                         vlnv->getType() == VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION)
01318         {
01319             // Check that the bus definition is compatible with the edited component.
01320             QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(*vlnv);
01321             QSharedPointer<BusDefinition> busDef = libComp.staticCast<BusDefinition>();
01322 
01323             if ((component_->getComponentImplementation() == KactusAttribute::KTS_HW &&
01324                  busDef->getType() == KactusAttribute::KTS_BUSDEF_HW) ||
01325                 (component_->getComponentImplementation() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW &&
01326                  busDef->getType() == KactusAttribute::KTS_BUSDEF_API))
01327             {
01328                 dragBus_ = true;
01329             }
01330         }
01331     }
01332 }
01333 
01334 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01335 // Function: dragMoveEvent()
01336 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01337 void BlockDiagram::dragMoveEvent(QGraphicsSceneDragDropEvent * event)
01338 {
01339     if (dragCompType_ != CIT_NONE)
01340     {
01341         DiagramColumn* column = layout_->findColumnAt(snapPointToGrid(event->scenePos()));
01342 
01343         if (column != 0 && column->getAllowedItems() & dragCompType_)
01344         {
01345             event->setDropAction(Qt::CopyAction);
01346         }
01347         else
01348         {
01349             event->setDropAction(Qt::IgnoreAction);
01350         }
01351 
01352         event->accept();
01353     }
01354     else if (dragBus_)
01355     {
01356         // Check if there is a connection endpoint close enough the cursor.
01357         DiagramConnectionEndPoint* endPoint =
01358             DiagramUtil::snapToItem<DiagramConnectionEndPoint>(event->scenePos(), this, GridSize);
01359 
01360         if (highlightedEndPoint_ != 0)
01361         {
01362             highlightedEndPoint_->setHighlight(DiagramConnectionEndPoint::HIGHLIGHT_OFF);
01363         }
01364         
01365         highlightedEndPoint_ = endPoint;
01366 
01367         // Allow the drop event if the end point is undefined or there are no connections
01368         // and the encompassing component is unpackaged.
01369         if (highlightedEndPoint_ != 0 &&
01370             (highlightedEndPoint_->getBusInterface() == 0 ||
01371              !highlightedEndPoint_->getBusInterface()->getBusType().isValid() ||
01372              (!highlightedEndPoint_->isConnected() &&
01373               highlightedEndPoint_->encompassingComp() != 0 &&
01374               !highlightedEndPoint_->encompassingComp()->componentModel()->getVlnv()->isValid())))
01375         {
01376             event->setDropAction(Qt::CopyAction);
01377             highlightedEndPoint_->setHighlight(DiagramConnectionEndPoint::HIGHLIGHT_HOVER);
01378         }
01379         else
01380         {
01381             event->setDropAction(Qt::IgnoreAction);
01382         }
01383     }
01384     else
01385     {
01386         event->setDropAction(Qt::IgnoreAction);
01387     }
01388 }
01389 
01390 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01391 // Function: dragLeaveEvent()
01392 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01393 void BlockDiagram::dragLeaveEvent(QGraphicsSceneDragDropEvent*)
01394 {
01395     dragCompType_ = CIT_NONE;
01396     dragBus_ = false;
01397     disableHighlight();
01398 }
01399 
01400 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01401 // Function: dropEvent()
01402 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01403 void BlockDiagram::dropEvent(QGraphicsSceneDragDropEvent *event)
01404 {
01405     // Check if the dragged item was a valid one.
01406     if (dragCompType_ != CIT_NONE)
01407     {
01408         DiagramColumn* column = layout_->findColumnAt(snapPointToGrid(event->scenePos()));
01409 
01410         // Retrieve the vlnv.
01411         VLNV *vlnv;
01412         memcpy(&vlnv, event->mimeData()->data("data/vlnvptr").data(), sizeof(vlnv));
01413 
01414         // Disallow self-instantiation.
01415         if (*vlnv == *component_->getVlnv())
01416         {
01417             QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Warning, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
01418                                tr("Component cannot be instantiated to its own design."),
01419                                QMessageBox::Ok, (QWidget*)parent());
01420             msgBox.exec();
01421             return;
01422         }
01423 
01424         // Create the component model.
01425                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(*vlnv);
01426         QSharedPointer<Component> comp = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
01427 
01428                 // Set the instance name for the new component instance.
01429                 QString instanceName = createInstanceName(comp);
01430 
01431         // Create the diagram component.
01432         DiagramComponent *newItem = new DiagramComponent(lh_, comp, instanceName);
01433         newItem->setPos(snapPointToGrid(event->scenePos()));
01434         connect(newItem, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
01435 
01436         if (column != 0)
01437         {
01438             QSharedPointer<ItemAddCommand> cmd(new ItemAddCommand(column, newItem));
01439 
01440                         connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(DiagramComponent*)),
01441                                 this, SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(DiagramComponent*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01442                         connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(DiagramComponent*)),
01443                                 this, SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(DiagramComponent*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
01444 
01445             editProvider_.addCommand(cmd);
01446         }
01447     }
01448     else if (dragBus_)
01449     {
01450         if (highlightedEndPoint_ != 0)
01451         {
01452             // Retrieve the busdef VLNV and determine the absdef VLNV.
01453             VLNV *droppedVlnv;
01454             memcpy(&droppedVlnv, event->mimeData()->data("data/vlnvptr").data(), sizeof(droppedVlnv));
01455 
01456                         Q_ASSERT(lh_->contains(*droppedVlnv));
01457 
01458             VLNV vlnv = *droppedVlnv;
01459                         vlnv.setType(lh_->getDocumentType(*droppedVlnv));
01460 
01461                         VLNV absdefVLNV;
01462 
01463                         // if the dropped was an abstraction definition
01464                         if (vlnv.getType() == VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION) {
01465                                 absdefVLNV = vlnv;
01466 
01467                                 // parse the abstraction definition
01468                                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(vlnv);
01469                                 QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition> absDef = libComp.staticCast<AbstractionDefinition>();
01470 
01471                                 // get the bus definition referenced by the abstraction definition
01472                                 VLNV busdefVLNV = absDef->getBusType();
01473 
01474                                 // set the bus definition used
01475                                 vlnv = busdefVLNV;
01476 
01477                                 Q_ASSERT(absdefVLNV.getType() == VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION);
01478                         }
01479                         Q_ASSERT(vlnv.getType() == VLNV::BUSDEFINITION);
01480 
01481             bool editName = highlightedEndPoint_->type() == DiagramInterface::Type &&
01482                             highlightedEndPoint_->getBusInterface() == 0 &&
01483                             highlightedEndPoint_->getInterconnections().empty();
01484 
01485             // Ask the user for the interface mode.
01486             BusInterfaceDialog dialog(editName, (QWidget*)parent());
01487             dialog.addMode(General::MIRROREDMASTER);
01488             dialog.addMode(General::SLAVE);
01489             dialog.addMode(General::MIRROREDSLAVE);
01490             dialog.addMode(General::SYSTEM);
01491             dialog.addMode(General::MIRROREDSYSTEM);
01492             dialog.addMode(General::MASTER);
01493 
01494             if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Rejected)
01495             {
01496                 highlightedEndPoint_->setHighlight(DiagramConnectionEndPoint::HIGHLIGHT_OFF);
01497                 return;
01498             }
01499 
01500             highlightedEndPoint_->setHighlight(DiagramConnectionEndPoint::HIGHLIGHT_OFF);
01501 
01502             // Save old settings.
01503             VLNV oldBusType;
01504             VLNV oldAbsType;
01505             General::InterfaceMode oldMode = General::MASTER;
01506             QString oldName = "";
01507 
01508             if (highlightedEndPoint_->getBusInterface() != 0)
01509             {
01510                 oldBusType = highlightedEndPoint_->getBusInterface()->getBusType();
01511                 oldAbsType = highlightedEndPoint_->getBusInterface()->getAbstractionType();
01512                 oldMode = highlightedEndPoint_->getBusInterface()->getInterfaceMode();
01513                 oldName = highlightedEndPoint_->getBusInterface()->getName();
01514             }
01515 
01516             // Define the bus for the end point.
01517             highlightedEndPoint_->setTypes(vlnv, absdefVLNV, dialog.getSelectedMode());
01518             
01519             if (editName)
01520             {
01521                 highlightedEndPoint_->getBusInterface()->setName(dialog.getName());
01522             }
01523 
01524             highlightedEndPoint_->updateInterface();
01525 
01526             // Create an undo command.
01527             QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new EndPointTypesCommand(highlightedEndPoint_,
01528                                                                       oldBusType, oldAbsType,
01529                                                                       oldMode, oldName));
01530             editProvider_.addCommand(cmd, false);
01531 
01532             highlightedEndPoint_ = 0;
01533         }
01534     }
01535 }
01536 
01537 QString BlockDiagram::createInstanceName( QSharedPointer<Component> component ) {
01538         int runningNumber = 1;
01539         QString instanceName = component->getVlnv()->getName();
01540         instanceName.remove(QString(".comp"));
01541         QString tempName = instanceName;
01542         tempName += "_";
01543         tempName += QString::number(runningNumber);
01544 
01545         // increase the number as long as there is another instance with same name
01546         while (instanceNames_.contains(tempName)) {
01547                 ++runningNumber;
01548                 tempName = instanceName;
01549                 tempName += "_";
01550                 tempName += QString::number(runningNumber);
01551         }
01552 
01553         // when temp name is unique
01554         instanceNames_.append(tempName);
01555         return tempName;
01556 }

01567 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01568 // Function: disableHighlight()
01569 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01570 void BlockDiagram::disableHighlight()
01571 {
01572     if (highlightedEndPoint_ != 0)
01573     {
01574         if (tempConnEndPoint_ != 0 && highlightedEndPoint_ != tempConnEndPoint_)
01575         {
01576             highlightedEndPoint_->setHighlight(DiagramConnectionEndPoint::HIGHLIGHT_ALLOWED);
01577         }
01578         else
01579         {
01580             highlightedEndPoint_->setHighlight(DiagramConnectionEndPoint::HIGHLIGHT_OFF);
01581         }
01582 
01583         highlightedEndPoint_ = 0;
01584     }
01585 }

01606 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01607 // Function: wheelEvent()
01608 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01609 void BlockDiagram::wheelEvent(QGraphicsSceneWheelEvent *event)
01610 {
01611     if (event->modifiers() == Qt::CTRL)
01612     {
01613         DesignWidget* doc = static_cast<DesignWidget*>(parent());
01614         QGraphicsView* view = doc->getView();
01615 
01616         // Retrieve the center point in scene coordinates.
01617         //QPointF origCenterPos = view->mapToScene(view->rect().center());
01618         QPointF centerPos = itemsBoundingRect().center();
01619 
01620         // Set the zoom level and center the view.
01621         doc->setZoomLevel(doc->getZoomLevel() + event->delta() / 12);
01622 
01623         view->centerOn(centerPos);
01624         event->accept();
01625     }
01626 }

01641 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01642 // Function: onSelected()
01643 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01644 void BlockDiagram::onSelected(QGraphicsItem* newSelection)
01645 {
01646     // Activate the correct views when something has been selected.
01647     if (newSelection)
01648     { 
01649         // Check if the selected item was a component.
01650         if (newSelection->type() == DiagramComponent::Type)
01651         {
01652             DiagramComponent* comp = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramComponent *>(newSelection);
01653             emit componentSelected(comp);
01654         }
01655         // Check if the selected item was a port.
01656         else if (newSelection->type() == DiagramPort::Type)
01657         {
01658             DiagramPort* port = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramPort*>(newSelection);
01659             emit portSelected(port);
01660         }
01661         // Check if the selected item was an interface.
01662         else if (newSelection->type() == DiagramInterface::Type)
01663         {
01664             DiagramInterface* interface = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramInterface*>(newSelection);
01665             emit interfaceSelected(interface);
01666         }
01667                 // check if the selected item was a connection
01668                 else if (newSelection->type() == DiagramInterconnection::Type) {
01669                         DiagramInterconnection* connection = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramInterconnection*>(newSelection);
01670                         emit connectionSelected(connection);
01671                 }
01672         // Otherwise the selection was an interconnection
01673         else
01674         {
01675             // inform others that nothing is currently selected
01676             emit clearItemSelection();
01677         }
01678     }
01679     else
01680     {
01681         // Clear the selection.
01682         emit clearItemSelection();
01683     }
01684 }
01685 
01686 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01687 // Function: onShow()
01688 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01689 void BlockDiagram::onShow()
01690 {
01691     // Retrieve the new selection.
01692     QGraphicsItem *newSelection = 0;
01693 
01694     if (!selectedItems().isEmpty())
01695     {
01696         newSelection = selectedItems().front();
01697     }
01698 
01699     onSelected(newSelection);
01700 }

01718 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01719 // Function: addInterface()
01720 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01721 void BlockDiagram::addInterface(DiagramColumn* column, QPointF const& pos)
01722 {
01723         QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busif(new BusInterface());
01724     DiagramInterface *newItem = new DiagramInterface(lh_, component_, busif, 0);
01725     newItem->setPos(snapPointToGrid(pos));
01726 
01727     connect(newItem, SIGNAL(errorMessage(QString const&)), this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(QString const&)));
01728     connect(newItem, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
01729 
01730     // Save the positions of the other diagram interfaces.
01731     QMap<DiagramInterface*, QPointF> oldPositions;
01732 
01733     if (column->getContentType() == COLUMN_CONTENT_IO)
01734     {
01735         foreach (QGraphicsItem* item, column->childItems())
01736         {
01737             if (item->type() == DiagramInterface::Type)
01738             {
01739                 DiagramInterface* interface = static_cast<DiagramInterface*>(item);
01740                 oldPositions.insert(interface, interface->scenePos());
01741             }
01742         }
01743     }
01744 
01745     QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new ItemAddCommand(column, newItem));
01746     cmd->redo();
01747 
01748     // Determine if the other interfaces changed their position and create undo commands for them.
01749     if (column->getContentType() == COLUMN_CONTENT_IO)
01750     {
01751         QMap<DiagramInterface*, QPointF>::iterator cur = oldPositions.begin();
01752 
01753         while (cur != oldPositions.end())
01754         {
01755             if (cur.key()->scenePos() != cur.value())
01756             {
01757                 QUndoCommand* childCmd = new ItemMoveCommand(cur.key(), cur.value(), cmd.data());
01758             }
01759 
01760             ++cur;
01761         }
01762     }
01763 
01764     editProvider_.addCommand(cmd, false);
01765 }
01766 
01767 QList<DiagramComponent*> BlockDiagram::getInstances() const {
01768 
01769         // the list to store the diagram components to
01770         QList<DiagramComponent*> instances;
01771 
01772         // ask for all graphics items.
01773         QList<QGraphicsItem*> graphItems = items();
01774         foreach (QGraphicsItem* graphItem, graphItems) {
01775 
01776                 // make dynamic type conversion
01777                 DiagramComponent* diagComp = dynamic_cast<DiagramComponent*>(graphItem);
01778                 // if the item was a diagram component then add it to the list.
01779                 if (diagComp) 
01780                         instances.append(diagComp);
01781         }
01782         return instances;
01783 }
